title: Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Caramelized Onions And Bacon
summary: Roasted Brussels Sprouts With Caramelized Onions And Bacon might be a good recipe to expand your side dish repertoire. One serving contains 183 calories, 2g of protein, and 20g of fat. For 35 cents per serving, this recipe covers 2% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 4. 20 people have made this recipe and would make it again. Christmas will be even more special with this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes about 1 hour and 9 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. It is brought to you by Serious Eats. Overall, this recipe earns a very bad (but still fixable) spoonacular score of 9%. Try Pan Sauteed Brussels Sprouts with Caramelized Onions & Bacon, Stress-Free Thanksgiving: Roasted Brussels Sprouts with Onions, Bacon and Cranberries, and Brussels Sprouts with Caramelized Onions for similar recipes.
